properties.entry: SELECT e.exp_id, cex.cnt_id, cex.cex_pase, e.EXP_PROCESS_BPM, e.exp_manual FROM exp_expedientes e JOIN ${master.schema}.dd_eex_estado_expediente eex ON e.dd_eex_id = eex.dd_eex_id AND eex.dd_eex_codigo in (?,?,?) JOIN cex_contratos_expediente cex ON cex.exp_id = e.exp_id JOIN CNT_CONTRATOS cnt ON cex.cnt_id = cnt.cnt_id JOIN ${master.schema}.dd_esc_estado_cnt esc ON cnt.dd_esc_id = esc.dd_esc_id JOIN MOV_MOVIMIENTOS mov ON mov.cnt_id = cnt.cnt_id and (mov.mov_fecha_extraccion = cnt.cnt_fecha_extraccion OR ? = (SELECT esc.dd_esc_codigo FROM ${master.schema}.dd_esc_estado_cnt esc WHERE cnt.dd_esc_id = esc.dd_esc_id)) JOIN dd_tpe_tipo_prod_entidad t ON cnt.dd_tpe_id = t.dd_tpe_id WHERE e.borrado = 0 ORDER BY e.exp_id
update cex_contratos_expediente set borrado = 1 where cnt_id = ? and exp_id = ? and borrado = 0
update exp_expedientes set DD_EEX_ID = (select DD_EEX_ID from ${master.schema}.DD_EEX_ESTADO_EXPEDIENTE where DD_EEX_CODIGO = ?), exp_process_bpm = null where exp_id = ? and borrado = 0
